com.khajas.service.currency

Class CurrencyApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khajas.service.ApiCall
      • com.khajas.service.currency.CurrencyApi

  • public class CurrencyApi
extends ApiCall
    Supports currency skills, it calls currency api registered at http://fixer.io/
    Author:
    - Anwar

      Constructor for currency skill

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String processRequest(String query)
      Process the request by calling the URL for currency api and prepare the response, it also makes a call to super class- method to get the JSON response.
      String serve(String append)
      Makes a call to request processor( method processRequest()) and returns the response appended by the 'append' parameter.

      • serve

        public String serve(String append)
        Makes a call to request processor( method processRequest()) and returns the response appended by the 'append' parameter.
        Specified by:
        serve in class ApiCall
        Parameters:
        append - A customized string that could be appended to response.
        Returns:
        response Response after processing user request.
